ValidationRule.description: If a Unit is selected, prevent Qty < 1
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( OR( Trans_Category__c = "Rental", Trans_Category__c = "Sale"), SBQQ__Quantity__c > 1, Unit_Text__c <> "Single Unit", Unit_Text__c <> "Complex", Unit_Text__c <> "New Unit", NOT(ISBLANK( Unit__c )))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Qty cannot be greater than 1 when a Unit is selected.
